ARGUMENT
f g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sitmval.d | |- D = ( dist ` W ) |
| 2 |  | sitmval.1 | |- ( ph -> W e. V ) |
| 3 |  | sitmval.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. U. ran measures ) |
| 4 |  | sitmfval.1 | |- ( ph -> F e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) |
| 5 |  | sitmfval.2 | |- ( ph -> G e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_sitmval | |- ( ph -> ( W sitm M ) = ( f e. dom ( W sitg M ) , g e. dom ( W sitg M ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( f = F /\ g = G ) ) -> f = F ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( f = F /\ g = G ) ) -> g = G ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( f = F /\ g = G ) ) -> ( f oF D g ) = ( F oF D G ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( f = F /\ g = G ) ) -> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) = ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( F oF D G ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( F oF D G ) ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( F oF D G ) ) e. _V ) |
| 13 | 6, 10, 4, 5, 12 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ph -> ( F ( W sitm M ) G ) = ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( F oF D G ) ) ) |
